title: Season of the Witch
description: This Halloween enter the world of witches and warlocks as we celebrate the season of the witches.With over 20+ stories, any witch or warlock can enjoy this anthology of curses, hexes, magic and adventure! Allow yourself to fall under the spell of these fantasy, urban fantasy and paranormal witch stories by USA Today and international bestselling authors.Whether you enjoy romance, horror, mystery or adventure there's something in this anthology for you! Scroll up and one click today!Featuring stories by:N.D. TestaNaomi PantheraJamie DaltonH. KinaniZelda KnightD. C. GomezCandace SamsShana VernonFaith GibsonStephanie B. WhitfieldElena CarterWendy CheairsC.A. King, USA Today Bestselling AuthorMaddison ColeSofia Ann HoffmanCara NorthKatherine BogleN.J. EmberKit BlackwoodTami LundRK PhillipsAlys Fraser
author: Naomi Panthera
